scripts.build: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  tsc
scripts.dev: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.dev:trace: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  nodemon --exec node --trace-deprecation -r ts-node/register src/server.ts
scripts.start: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  node dist/server.js
scripts.start:trace: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  node --trace-deprecation dist/server.js
scripts.lint: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  eslint . --ext .ts
scripts.test: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  jest --clearCache && jest --detectOpenHandles --testTimeout=20000 --verbose
scripts.test:watch: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  jest --watch
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  npm cache clean --force && jest --clearCache && jest --detectOpenHandles --testTimeout=20000 --verbose --coverage
scripts.test:clear: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  npm cache clean --force && jest --clearCache && jest --detectOpenHandles --testTimeout=20000
scripts.format: cross-env IS_WINDOWS=%OS% && node -e "process.env.IS_WINDOWS === 'Windows_NT' ? console.clear() : console.log('\033c')" &&  prettier --write .
